thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: MS

author: MS
title: MS
text:
Though I didn't end up going with one of their recommended installers i did use their website and made a few phone calls to them to clarify a few details prior to acceptance of my installer.
They give good advice coupled with reasonable expectations that I should have of the panels, inverters and overall system.
They have a myriad of useful information on their website, ably backed up by their phone advice.
